page.title: 03Rolvenden Church: Activities
page.content: It is an expensive job to maintain the Church buildings and keep them in good repair so there are many different fund-raising activities each year. This year there was a{Flower {Festival}in May. The Church was decorated with flowers and looked very pretty. There was a display of arts & crafts by local people. Refreshments were on sale in the Village Hall. There was also a{Sponsored Walk and {Run}which raised Â£600.{Coffee Mornings are often held too. They are usually held in people's houses or gardens and everyone brings something to sell, such as cakes, plants or clothes. They also pay for refreshments and buy what other people have brought so that money is raised. It is a good chance for people to catch up on the latest Village gossip!
